select question_part_id questionPartId,question_id questionId,question_part_title questionPartTitle,question_type questionType,question_pst_form questionPstForm,question_pst_subform questionPstSubform,subject_area subjectArea,question_player questionPlayer,file_used_by_player fileUsedByPlayer,target_label_text targetLabelText,target_answer_text targetAnswerText,create_date createDate,modify_date modifyDate,create_peson_id createPesonId,modify_person_id modifyPersonId,del_flg delFlg from question_part where del_flg != '01' and ( question_part_id = #{questionPartId} ) order by create_date desc
